org.xandercat.pmdb.controller

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xandercat.pmdb.controller.HomeController

  • @Controller
public class HomeController
extends Object
    Controller for movie functions on the user's active movie collection. Primarily includes searching, adding, editing, and deleting movies.
    Author:
    Scott Arnold

      • home

        @GetMapping(value="/")
public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                           Principal principal,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Page for listing movies within user's default/active movie collection. This is considered the main "home" page of the application, where users can search and update their movie collection.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        session - session
        Returns:
        home page

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="/movies/search")
public String search(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                              Principal principal,
                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="searchForm")
                                                              SearchForm searchForm,
                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Search user's default/active movie collection. This filters the list of movies in the user's default/active movie collection to those that match their search.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        session - session
        searchForm - search form
        result - binding result
        Returns:
        home page, filtered to only movies matching their search

      • movieDetails

        @RequestMapping(value="/movies/movieDetails")
public String movieDetails(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                          Principal principal,
                                                                          @RequestParam
                                                                          String movieId)
        AJAX method for returning the full details of a single movie in the user's movie collection. Returned result is an HTML fragment that can be loaded into a dialog.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        movieId - id of movie to get details for
        Returns:
        page fragment for movie details

      • reorderColumns

        @RequestMapping(value="/movies/reorderColumns")
public String reorderColumns(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                              Principal principal,
                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                              int dragIndex,
                                                                              @RequestParam
                                                                              int dropIndex,
                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Reorder columns shown on the home page table of movies using drag and drop indicies for columns.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        dragIndex - index of column being moved
        dropIndex - index of column where target column is being moved to
        session - session
        Returns:
        page for configuring movie table columns

      • dismissSessionAlert

        @RequestMapping(value="/dismissSessionAlert")
 @ResponseBody
public void dismissSessionAlert(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                                               String key)
        AJAX generic request to dismiss a "session alert". Once a session alert is dismissed, it will remain dismissed for the duration of the user's session. Provides no response.
        Parameters:
        session - session
        key - key for alert
